SurveySuite

The original purpose of SurveySuite was to add a crosstab function that can make a table for multiple survey and demographic questions at the same time. It comes from the helpful code in this Stack Overflow thread with additional functionality added.I plan to expand this package to include more functions related to survey research that I use in my work.

Installation

You can install SurveySuite using the remotes package.

remotes::install_github("hunterjohnson11/SurveySuite")

Example

This is a basic example that shows how to use the crosstab function to create a table with multiple survey questions and demographic variables.

library(SurveySuite)
library(tidyverse)
## basic example code

cols <- c("q1", "q2", "q3")
sub_vars <- c("rel", "partyid", "ideo5")

table <- survey %>% crosstab(cols, sub_vars)
table #For viewing table in view pane. 
gtsave(table, "surveytable.html") #For exporting table.
